articles.title: Dubai free zone shifts crypto token vetting to licensed firms
articles.description: DFSAâ€™s new company-led suitability model and AML expectations would make it difficult for licensed firms to justify supporting privacy-focused assets.

articles.title: Bitcoin pares Powell-fueled spike as privacy coins outperform: Crypto Markets Today
articles.description: Bitcoin briefly topped $92,000 on interest-rate uncertainty, while privacy coins hit fresh highs and memecoin activity lifted select altcoins.

articles.title: Crypto funds bleed $454M in outflows as Fed rate-cut hopes fade
articles.description: Bitcoin led with $405 million of outflows last week, with the US shedding $569 million, as several altcoins and European funds posted modest inflows.

articles.title: UK lawmakers push to ban crypto political donations over foreign interference fears
articles.description: They argue that cryptocurrency's opacity and traceability issues make it a threat to democratic integrity, citing an intelligence report election interference.

articles.title: OKX founder defends asset freezes after user admits buying KYC accounts
articles.description: Star Xu defended freezing $40,000 in stablecoins after a user admitted buying verified accounts, with the exchange citing strict KYC and AML obligations.
